title: "Backend_Prediction"
output: html_document

```{r setupBack, include=FALSE}
library(recommenderlab)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(feather)
```

```{r prediction}
m <- read_feather("./ratings_comments.feather")  %>% as.data.frame() %>% as("realRatingMatrix")
rec_UBCF <- Recommender(m, method = "UBCF")
rec_SVD <- Recommender(m, method = "UBCF")

pred_UBCF <- recommenderlab::predict(rec_UBCF, m, data = m, type="ratings")

test <- (as(pred_UBCF, "matrix"))
test2 <- as.data.frame(test)

test2$`4903`[row.names(test2) == "\"R_06zkMiYVH33j8fD\""]
```
